\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [virtual]}}\hypertarget{classg2o_1_1BaseBinaryEdge_a06a18745d95017c6d3c841f838a65364}{}\label{classg2o_1_1BaseBinaryEdge_a06a18745d95017c6d3c841f838a65364}
Linearizes the constraint in the edge. Makes side effect on the vertices of the graph by changing the parameter vector b and the hessian blocks ii and jj. The off diagoinal block is accesed via \+\_\+hessian. 

Implements \hyperlink{classg2o_1_1OptimizableGraph_1_1Edge_a56fbf3430ddf591e3c619bdd1b7e4499}{g2o\+::\+Optimizable\+Graph\+::\+Edge}.
